attributes.action: Bring back the old system of GP appointments- the new system is not working!
attributes.additional_details: The authorities insisted he moved to appointments but he kept 5 slots available per clinic for emergencies. Government targets were emergency patients to be seen in 3 days. My Dad saw them same day! People with a long-term condition were seen every 3 months, keeping the condition under control minimizing hospital referrals. My Dad also had innumerable nurse led specialist clinics further keeping conditions under control. I am a former training GP and Joe Public wants this system back.
attributes.background: If it’s not broken don’t fix it. Under the new system, people can’t get a GP appointment leading to more going to hospital or even deaths. When my Dad was a GP he made 15 appointments per clinic. You took a numbered paddle. You were seen in numerical order. Patients loved it- they got seen!

rejection.details: Decisions about how to offer GP services are a matter for individual GPs, not the UK Government or Parliament.
